name: WATCH (Toby Clark)
description:
Created by Toby Clark

You play as a watchman at the National Museum of Poland (Fictional). The Museum has been taken over by fantasy creatures and it is up to you to infiltrate and take out them, to guard the artefacts and maintain the integrity of the building, ready for re-opening tomorrow.

Explore a full museum in first person, find weapons and eliminate enemies in this horror/action adventure! Simply extract and execute.

This game was created after months of meticulous planning of level design and investigating Polish Architecture, based on the Dluga, Gdansk, Poland. I studied several museums, travelled to Poland to make this game what it is.

I hope you enjoy!  Please comment what you think, and rate!
